controller.render.spark.tutorial_button.geometry: ((q.distance_from_camera < 4.1 && Math.abs(Math.mod(q.rotation_to_camera(1) - q.camera_rotation(1) + 720, 360) - 180) < 58 / (q.distance_from_camera - v.button_distance/16) && Math.abs(q.camera_rotation(0)) < 25 / (q.distance_from_camera - v.button_distance/16) ) || q.property('spark:activated')) ? Geometry.on : Geometry.default
